Module kivakit.interfaces
Package com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric

Interface Numeric<Value extends LongValued>

Type Parameters:
Value - The integer type
All Superinterfaces:
Arithmetic<Value>, LongValued, Mapper<Long,Value>, Maximizable<Value>, Minimizable<Value>, NextIterator<Value>, Zeroable
public interface Numeric<Value extends LongValued> extends Arithmetic<Value>, Maximizable<Value>, Minimizable<Value>
Interface for common operations on integers (in the math sense, not in the sense of Integer).
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
